The Student Petitions website allows students to write petitions to support their causes. Other students can sign the petition in a secure way on the website. Once a petition reaches 250 signatures, the Student Senate must hold a presentation to discuss the petition at a general meeting. Have you used the Student Petitions website (https://petitions.union.rpi.edu/)?
